title: Hack Club's AI Dinosaur Assistant
description: Built an AI-powered chatbot that answers questions about dinosaurs AND helps with coding. Because why choose?
readme:
# Dino Code Helper

Combines my two loves: dinosaurs and programming. Uses GPT-4 to answer dinosaur facts while helping debug your code.

## Features
- Dinosaur fact database
- Code debugging
- Pairs well with coffee

## Tech Stack
- Python
- OpenAI API
- Flask
- Lots of dinosaur enthusiasm

title: Real-time Collaborative Code Editor
description: Google Docs but for code. Share a link, code together in real-time. No setup required.
readme:
# CodeTogether

Wanted to pair program with my friend in another timezone. Built this instead of using VS Code Live Share because where's the fun in that?

## Features
- Real-time collaboration
- Syntax highlighting for 20+ languages
- Built-in chat
- Share with a link

## Tech Stack
- Next.js
- Socket.io
- Monaco Editor
- Y.js for CRDT

title: Generative Art NFT Marketplace
description: Create algorithmic art and mint it as NFTs. Each piece is unique and generated on-demand.
readme:
# ArtGen Market

Combining my love for design and blockchain. Generate unique art pieces using various algorithms.

## Features
- 10 different art generation algorithms
- Mint as NFTs on Polygon
- Gallery showcase
- Opensea integration

## Tech Stack
- React + Three.js
- Solidity smart contracts
- IPFS for storage
- Polygon network

title: Smart Home Dashboard with Arduino
description: Control all my smart home devices from a custom-built dashboard. Built the hardware AND software.
readme:
# HomeHub

Because paying for smart home hubs is for people with money. Built my own with Arduino and a Raspberry Pi.

## Features
- Control lights, temperature, music
- Custom PCB design
- Voice commands via Google Assistant
- Energy usage tracking

## Hardware
- Arduino Mega
- Raspberry Pi 4
- Custom PCB
- Various sensors and relays

title: ML-Powered Recipe Recommender
description: Tell it what's in your fridge, get recipe recommendations. Uses machine learning to understand your taste.
readme:
# FridgeChef

Tired of wasting food. Built an AI that tells me what to cook based on what's about to expire.

## Features
- Image recognition for ingredients
- Personalized recommendations
- Recipe database with 10,000+ recipes
- Nutrition tracking

## Tech Stack
- Python + FastAPI
- TensorFlow for image recognition
- Collaborative filtering for recommendations
- Next.js frontend

title: Hack Club Shell Economy Simulator
description: Simulate the entire SOM shell economy. Predict shell inflation, track whale movements, become a virtual economist.
readme:
# Shell Economics

Because I wanted to understand if shells would experience inflation. Spoiler: they did.

## Features
- Real-time shell tracking
- Inflation calculator
- Whale wallet monitoring
- Economic predictions

## Tech Stack
- Python for data analysis
- PostgreSQL
- Chart.js for visualizations
- React dashboard

title: Markdown-Powered Presentation Tool
description: Write your slides in Markdown, get beautiful presentations. Like reveal.js but better (fight me).
readme:
# SlidesMD

PowerPoint is dead. Long live Markdown presentations.

## Features
- Write slides in Markdown
- Live preview
- Beautiful themes
- Code syntax highlighting
- Export to PDF

## Tech Stack
- Svelte
- Marked.js
- Prism.js
- Puppeteer for PDF export

title: CSS Animation Playground
description: Interactive tool to create and export CSS animations. Drag, drop, animate, copy code.
readme:
# AnimateCSS Pro

Because CSS animations are hard and I wanted a visual editor.

## Features
- Visual keyframe editor
- Real-time preview
- Export to CSS
- Animation library
- Easing function visualizer

## Tech Stack
- React
- Framer Motion
- Monaco Editor
- Canvas API
